name: Shrunkeon Dungeon
description:
Don't die or the dungeon will collapse on you.

Level up to restore your health.

Or lose health and get buffed :P

Control:
  • 1 to 3 - Change Weapons
  • Hold Left Click - Attack
  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Esc - Pause
Credits:
  • Game Engine: Godot 3
  • Music: Keven MacLeod
